channel.title: shakekology – Joyful Fit Life
channel.description: A mom of two helping you create a lifestyle to achieve your fitness and nutrition goals and keeping you motivated for success!

item.title: What is Shakeology?
item.dc:creator: Kristi Kennedy
item.description: What is Shakeology? Best known as “your daily dose of dense nutrition,” Shakeology is a premium superfood shake containing healthy ingredients, including super-proteins, super-fruits, super-greens, antioxidants, adaptogen herbs, pre and pro-biotics, and digestive enzymes. The amazing benefits come from herbs, roots, fruits, and vegetables that range from the commonly known, like pomegranate and blueberry, to Read more about What is Shakeology?[…]

item.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Shakeology
item.dc:creator: Kristi Kennedy
item.description: 1 Scoop Vanilla Shakeology 1/2 cup almond milk 1/2 cup water 1 tsp vanilla extract Dash Cinnamon 8 Chocolate chips (I used Ghirardelli semi-sweet chocolate chips) 5-6 Ice Cubes Blend and Enjoy!
